author: The Telegraph
title: Exclusive book offer: Go Set a Watchman
text: Go Set a Watchman is set during the mid-1950s and features many of the characters from To Kill a Mockingbird some 20 years later. Scout (Jean Louise Finch) has returned to Maycomb from New York to visit her father Atticus. She is forced to grapple with issues both personal and political as she tries to understand her fatherâ€™s attitude toward society and herfeelings about the place where she was born and spent her childhood. How to claim See the newspaper on Tuesday, July 14 for details on how to claim. Follow @telegraph
